import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create workflow step"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/workflows/steps/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new workflow step (status) that can be used in workflow transitions.

**Note**: This endpoint is part of API version 1.0 which is marked as deprecated.

**Authentication**: Requires authenticated user with workflow management permissions.

**Required Fields**:
- `WorkflowId` - Parent workflow this step belongs to
- `StepName` - Display name for the step
- `StatusId` - Associated status identifier
- `IsClosed` - Whether tickets in this step are considered closed
- `DisplayOrder` - Ordering position in UI

**Workflow Example**:
1. Create workflow: [POST /api/v1.0/workflows/new](/docs/api/workflows/create-workflow) â†’ get `WorkflowId`.
2. Create step: [POST /api/v1.0/workflows/steps/new](/docs/api/workflows/create-workflow-step) with `WorkflowId`.
3. Configure next-step mappings for transitions.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

considered closed."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Flag indicating if the step has been soft-deleted."},"StatusId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Legacy status command should surface in the overflow/more menu."},"CommandApprovalTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Approval type required when transitioning to this action to perform (e.g., send email, assign ticket)."},"WorkflowActionTypeName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display name of the action type.","example":"Send Email Notification"},"Options":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"JSON string containing action-specific configuration options."},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Order in which actions execute within a step."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the action was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the action was last modified."}},"required":["WorkflowStepActionId","WorkflowStepId","WorkflowActionTypeId","SortOrder"],"title":"WorkflowStepAction"},"description":"Collection of automated actions triggered when entering this step."},"NextSteps":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines an allowed transition from one workflow step to mapping."},"WorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Source workflow step from which this transition originates."},"AllowedNextWorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Target workflow step that can be transitioned to."},"IsAllActionsCompleteRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, all step actions must be completed before this transition is allowed."},"StepName":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Display name of the target step for convenience.","example":"In Progress"},"SourceEntityTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity type identifier for the source system."},"SourceEntityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Entity identifier from the source system."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the mapping was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the mapping was last modified."}},"required":["WorkflowNextStepId","WorkflowStepId","AllowedNextWorkflowStepId","IsAllActionsCompleteRequired"],"title":"WorkflowNextStep"},"description":"Collection of allowed next-step transitions from this step."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the step was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"UTC timestamp when the step was last modified."},"OriginId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Identifier of the source record if migrated from another code used to render the step in the Approval","StepDescription":"Ticket is awaiting manager approval.","StatusId":"22222222-3333-4444-5555-666666666666","StatusName":"Pending","IsClosed":false,"IsDeleted":false,"CommandName":"Request Approval","CommandSortOrder":1,"CommandMore":false,"CommandApprovalTypeId":"99999999-aaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddddddddddd","CommandApprovalStage":1,"DisplayOrder":25,"Actions":[],"NextSteps":[],"Color":"#FFCC00"}}}}}
